document.full_text: at&t inc  won a ruling from a manhattan federal judge to decertify a class-action lawsuit by more than 4,100 workers who complained its mobile unit failed to properly pay wages and overtime.
document.title: at&t wage lawsuit cannot proceed as class-action
lines_and_colors: at&t inc  won a ruling from a manhattan federal judge to decertify a class-action lawsuit by more than 4,100 workers who complained its mobile unit failed to properly pay wages and overtime.
